mutants.code:
def find_swap_values(arr1, arr2):
    (sum1, sum2) = (sum(arr1), sum(arr2))
    difference = sum1 + sum2
    if difference % 2 != 0:
        return None
    difference //= 2
    values = [(i, j) for i in arr1 for j in arr2 if i - j == difference]
    return values[0] if values else None
